answers.answer: What were your most recent lab results? That will give us a better idea of what is going on.  :)
My feet felt very 'hot' when I was severely hypo this spring during a med change. It lasted two months,  gone now.

question: Was hyperthyroid, now hypothyroid and symptoms are slowly beginning to occur... my feet feel like they are on fire with periods of stinging (not tingling) type pain.  I am taking 30 mg of Armour in the morning...I am hoping the foot problems are related to the hypo or B12 deficiency instead of diabetes..what do you guys think?  Thanks, Pam
title: Shooting pains and fire hot feet!
